title: Xara Web Designer Premium 9 v9.2.1.28737 Installer
description:
Xara Web Designer Premium 9 v9.2.1.28737 Installer - -nelly-
           ============================================================



                N.B.: THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Xara Web Designer is unlike any web design software you will have seen before; an easy template based solution that gives you total page design freedom, no HTML skills required. Comes in 2 versions, Web Designer and Web Designer Premium; Premium offers advanced web design features.

Many of you may be interested in making a website but do not have any knowledge in this area.
Xara Web Designer Premium is a powerful software in designing web pages easier. Possible changes directly on pages, the possibility of integrating the database for color coding system to facilitate the identification code, or debugging, compatibility with CSS and HTML, optimization done for faster and better pictures on the web site.

Feature :
=========

Ability to Build a Website.
Ability to create web graphics.
Ability to create Flash.
New Design Tools.
Support for multiple programming languages.
WYSIWYG design is design that the users will be able to see.
Ability to upload on server.
Ability to use all the Object in a Web page.
Pop-up menus feature for images.
Ability to change colors, text and photos.
Compatible with a variety of management systems.
Compatible web browsers such as E 5.5, Firefox, Safari, Chrome.
Compatible with XHTML, CSS.
Import vectors of graphics, images and text including PDF, RTF, RAW, PSD, TIFF and JPEG, PNG, GIF.
High quality results with this software.


System Requirements :
=====================


Microsoft Windows XP, Vista,7 and 8.
x32 bit and x64 bit.
Minimum of Intel Celeron or AMD Sempron.
500MB of RAM.
300MB of available hard-disk space.



=================================================================
